name: Premium Copper Cookware Set
description: Hand-hammered copper cookware for professional-grade cooking. Includes 2 saucepans, 1 stockpot, and 1 skillet.

name: Artisan Ceramic Vase
description: Beautifully crafted ceramic vase to elevate your home decor. Each piece is unique and hand-painted.

name: Organic Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Sustainable and durable cutting board for your kitchen needs. Naturally antibacterial and knife-friendly.

name: Luxury Scented Candle
description: Relax with the soothing aroma of our premium soy wax candles. Available in Lavender, Vanilla, and Sandalwood.

name: Cast Iron Skillet
description: Pre-seasoned cast iron skillet for perfect searing and baking. A kitchen essential that lasts a lifetime.

name: Marble Cheese Board
description: Elegant marble cheese board with gold handles. Perfect for entertaining guests.

name: Japanese Chef Knife
description: High-carbon stainless steel chef knife with a Damascus pattern. Razor-sharp precision.

name: Linen Table Runner
description: 100% pure linen table runner in natural beige. Adds a touch of rustic elegance to your dining table.

name: Professional Espresso Machine
description: Barista-quality espresso machine with built-in grinder and milk frother. Perfect coffee every morning.

name: Classic Stand Mixer
description: Powerful stand mixer with 5-quart bowl. Essential for baking cakes, breads, and cookies.

name: Crystal Wine Glasses (Set of 4)
description: Elegant lead-free crystal wine glasses. Designed to enhance the aroma and flavor of your favorite wines.

name: Enameled Dutch Oven
description: Versatile cast iron dutch oven with enamel coating. Ideal for slow cooking, braising, and baking.

name: Ceramic Dinner Plate Set
description: Hand-glazed ceramic plates, set of 4. Earthy tones, perfect for any dining occasion.

name: Stainless Steel Cutlery Set
description: 24-piece set, modern design. Includes forks, knives, and spoons for 6 place settings.

name: Woven Placemats
description: Natural seagrass placemats, set of 4. Adds a touch of nature to your table setting.

name: Glass Water Pitcher
description: Elegant glass pitcher with handle. Perfect for serving water, juice, or iced tea.

name: Wooden Salad Bowl
description: Acacia wood salad bowl with servers. Beautiful grain patterns make each bowl unique.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Fast-boiling electric kettle, stainless steel. Auto shut-off and boil-dry protection.

name: Toaster
description: 2-slice toaster with wide slots. Adjustable browning control and defrost setting.

name: Blender
description: High-speed blender for smoothies and soups. Durable stainless steel blades.
